title: Dashboard â€” Add View All to recent searches
description: Add a 'View all' button to the recent searches section on the dashboard, matching the pattern used in the 'Shoots this week' section. Button navigates to search history page.
acceptanceCriteria: 'View all' button present with correct placement
Button placement mirrors 'Shoots this week' section

steps.details: Confirm the recent searches query returns accurate count. Check if any searches are missing from the display.
Add a 'View all' link/button in the section header, matching the same pattern as the Shoots this week section. Use Link from next/link pointing to /admin/history.
Match the text-sm text-accent-text hover styling used in the Shoots this week View All button.
